DataElement.preferredName: Person Household Year Passive Smoke Exposure Year Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the number of years there was exposure for at least one year to tobacco smoke products by a person living in the same house in a person who do not smoke.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Household Year Passive Smoke Exposure
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the exposure for at least one year to tobacco smoke products by a person living in the same house in a person who do not smoke.

Property.preferredDefinition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes. Household is a common unit for classifying population data.:The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

Concepts.definition: A social unit comprised of one or more individuals living together (all of whom need not be related) in the same dwelling, who aggregate and share their incomes.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun; a period of time containing 365 days.:To determine the number or amount of something; the result of this activity.

Concepts.definition: A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
Determining the number or amount of something.

ReferenceDocuments.name: For about how many years, in
